oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WAVE-INDUCED SHIP MOTIONS IN HARBOUR APPROACH CHANNELS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Van Wyk, A.C.
Zwamborn, J.A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: ship motion
wave induced ship motion
harbor
approach channel
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The results of scale-model simulation of wave-induced hull motions of large bulk carriers under conditions representative of those for coastal ports are presented and discussed to illustrate their usefulness in studies aimed at evaluating the optimum depth requirements for port approach channels.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 21 (1988): Proceedings of 21st Conference on Coastal Engineering, Torremolinos, Spain, 1988.; 216
